titles.title: Hydrographic Services Improvement Amendments Act of 2015
To reauthorize the Hydrographic Services Improvement Act of 1998, and for other purposes.
Hydrographic Services Improvement Amendments Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.

bill.summary:
Hydrographic Services Improvement Amendments Act of 2015
This bill reauthorizes the Hydrographic Services Improvement Act of 1998 through FY2019.
The Governmental Accountability Office must compare the unit costs of hydrographic surveys conducted by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to the unit costs of procuring the surveys.
